Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit your business. After careful consideration and evaluation, I am offering you the opportunity to acquire this product at a special introductory price of $950000. This offer is exclusive to you and represents an exceptional value considering the product's true worth of $1000000 to you. I am confident that this investment will pay off in numerous ways for your company. Please let me know if you have any questions or need further information. I look forward to the possibility of working together. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $950,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $950,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $1,000,000
